### Government Tender Announcement
#### Electrical Service and Maintenance

**Tender Reference:** PW_PWY-036-9162
**Tender Title:** Electrical Service and Maintenance Standing Offer
**Contracting Authority:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Background:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a stand-by electrical service and maintenance contract for various military installations in the Nanaimo and Nanoose Bay area of British Columbia, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will provide all required labor, supervision, materials, equipment, and transportation for electrical services and maintenance at the various military installations. Services will include, but not be limited to, interior and exterior lighting, electrical repairs and upkeep, structural cabling systems, and emergency repairs to primary and secondary distribution systems.

**Bid Requirements:**
Bidders must use the Canada Post CPC Connect application to submit their offers electronically. The bidding process starts with a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO). Tender documents may be obtained from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Equivelent G.S.I.N.:** Various Electrical Contracting Services.

**Duration of Contract:**
The Standing Offer shall be valid for a fixed 3-year period commencing from the start date listed on the Standing Offer. Two (2) irrevocable options to extend the term of the Standing Offer each for an additional consecutive twelve (12) month period under the same terms and conditions as contained in the Standing Offer.

**Security Requirement:**
The contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), PWGSC. Contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive site must hold a valid personnel security screening at the level of SECRET.

**Estimated Value:**
It is anticipated that one (1) standing offer will be issued with a total estimated expenditure of CAD $1,102,500.00 (GST included) for the three (3) year period.

* Fax: (604) 775-6633
* Address: 800 Burrard St, Room 219, Vancouver, BC, V6Z 0B9
